document.full_text: scientists searching for clues to alzheimer's have found that higher blood levels of a protein called clusterin are closely linked with the presence and severity of the brain disease, but not with the risk of developing it.
document.title: study finds blood marker can't predict alzheimer's
lines_and_colors: scientists searching for clues to alzheimer's have found that higher blood levels of a protein called clusterin are closely linked with the presence and severity of the brain disease, but not with the risk of developing it.
